title.rendered: Eldorado Stone featured in Cooking with Paula Deen Magazine!

content.rendered: Eldorado Stone is featured in Cooking with Paula Deen magazine’s two recent issues that cover an impressive home project in Alabama. Chosen for its rustic colors, the Veneto Fieldledge and Bracciano RomaBrick profiles are incorporated into the home’s kitchen and archways. Equally as impressive, the features of Eldorado Stone reach more than 1.5 million readers across the country!
